name: unifi-network
title: UniFi Network
description: Quick view of UniFi network clients and more
author: lewj

commands.name: select-site
commands.title: Select Site
commands.description: Select site to view devices/clients for

commands.name: view-devices
commands.title: View Devices
commands.description: View general info, radios, ports and quickly restart devices connected to your UniFi network

preferences.name: statsPollingInterval
preferences.title: Live Stats Interval
preferences.description: The interval in seconds to poll live stats

commands.name: view-clients
commands.title: View Clients
commands.description: View info and quickly copy key info of clients connected to your UniFi network

preferences.name: groupClientsByOctet
preferences.title: Group clients by octet
preferences.description: Group clients by the first X octets of their IP address. 0 = Disabled

preferences.name: host
preferences.title: UniFi Host
preferences.description: The hostname of your UniFi controller

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: UniFi API Key
preferences.description: The API key for your UniFi controller

preferences.name: dateFormat
preferences.title: Date Format
preferences.description: The format to display dates in

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
